title: The Asset Allocator: Best Advisors, Part III
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Financial advisors cannot ignore the business aspects of their profession, and should put thought into how to market themselves. This podcast (4:58) argues that the key objectives should be to become discoverable; to define one’s unique abilities; and to use the advisor’s best communication method to demonstrate how the advisor’s offering addresses the prospect’s unique pain points. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
